title: Visions of Japan
inclusions_evidence: First-Class or Superior First-Class accommodation with private bath or shower
Seamless transportation by private, air-conditioned motorcoach with free Wi-Fi
Services of a Tour Director and Local Guides

other.notes: Costs for meals and transportation are not provided.

reasoning: The deal offers a comprehensive tour experience with meals and guided services included, but lacks specific DIY pricing for flights and accommodations, making it difficult to assess savings accurately.
additional_notes: Further research needed for DIY pricing.
